      • getNews

        @GetMapping
public java.util.List<News> getNews​(@PageableDefault @SortDefault(sort="date")
                                    org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Controller for receiving the list of news, no comments.
        Parameters:
        pageable - page number being viewed. May be missing. Default: page - 0, number of entities per page - 10, sorting of entities - by date.
        Returns:
        list of entities - news, no comments.

      • getNews

        @GetMapping("/parameter")
public java.util.List<News> getNews​(@RequestParam("date")
                                    java.lang.String userInputDate,
                                    @RequestParam("title")
                                    java.lang.String userInputTitle,
                                    @RequestParam("text")
                                    java.lang.String userInputText,
                                    @PageableDefault @SortDefault(sort="date")
                                    org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Controller for receiving a list of news corresponding to the specified parameters, no comments.
        Parameters:
        userInputDate - User-specified parameter: date. Can be empty or have a partial match.
        userInputTitle - User-supplied parameter: title. May be empty, partial match, or different case.
        userInputText - User-specified parameter: text. May be empty, partial match, or different case.
        pageable - page number being viewed. May be missing. Default: page - 0, number of entities per page - 10, sorting of entities - by date.
        Returns:
        list of entities - news, no comments.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.bind.MissingServletRequestParameterException - if there is no parameter (at least empty): date, title and text.

      • createNews

        @PostMapping
@ResponseStatus(CREATED)
public News createNews​(@RequestBody @Valid
                       @Valid CreateNewsRequest createNewsRequest)
        New news creation processing controller.
        Parameters:
        createNewsRequest - request to create a new news item.
        Returns:
        entity - news, no comment.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException - if the fields in the request are incorrectly filled.

      • readNews

        @GetMapping("/details/{id}")
public News readNews​(@PathVariable
                     java.util.UUID id,
                     @PageableDefault @SortDefault(sort="date")
                     org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Processing controller for reading the details of one news item, with comments.
        Parameters:
        id - UUID identifier of the entity - news.
        pageable - the number of the comment page being viewed. May be missing. Default: page - 0, number of entities per page - 10, sorting of entities - by date.
        Returns:
        entity - news, with comment.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.method.annotation.MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException - if the news ID is set incorrectly.
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no news was found for the given identifier.

      • updateNews

        @PutMapping
public News updateNews​(@RequestBody @Valid
                       @Valid UpdateNewsRequest updateNewsRequest)
        News update processing controller.
        Parameters:
        updateNewsRequest - request for news update.
        Returns:
        entity - news, no comment.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException - if the fields in the request are incorrectly filled.
        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.exc.InvalidFormatException - if the news ID field in the request is filled incorrectly.
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no news was found by the given identifier in the request.

      • deleteNews

        @DeleteMapping("/{id}")
public java.util.UUID deleteNews​(@PathVariable
                                 java.util.UUID id)
        News deletion processing controller.
        Parameters:
        id - UUID identifier of the entity - news.
        Returns:
        UUID identifier of the entity - news.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.method.annotation.MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException - if the news ID is set incorrectly.
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no news was found for the given identifier.
